name: Alchimie Forever
description: Alchimie Forever is a skincare and fragrance company that specializes in creating products that blend scientific innovation with the art of perfumery. Founded by Dr. Farris, the brand focuses on formulations that are not only luxurious but also effective, offering a range of scents that cater to different preferences. Their story revolves around the belief that beauty and well-being are interconnected, and they strive to promote a healthy lifestyle through their unique offerings.

name: Alchimista
description: Alchimista is a niche perfume company that specializes in the art of creating unique and exquisite fragrances. It is known for its artisanal approach, blending traditional perfumery techniques with modern innovation. Founded on the philosophy of crafting scents that evoke emotions and memories, Alchimista focuses on the use of high-quality, natural ingredients to create signature perfumes that cater to individual tastes. The company's story begins with a passion for scent, leading to the establishment of a brand that embodies creativity and craftsmanship in fragrance creation.

name: Alcina
description: Alcina is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Established with a vision to combine artistry with perfumery, Alcina draws inspiration from nature and personal experiences to craft unique scents. The brand prides itself on using premium ingredients and traditional methods, focusing on evoking emotions and memories through their fragrances. Alcina is dedicated to delivering a personal touch in the world of perfumery, making it a distinctive player in the industry.

name: Alcone
description: Alcone is a perfume and beauty products company that specializes in high-quality fragrances. Founded with a passion for artistry in scent creation, Alcone focuses on blending exquisite ingredients to produce unique olfactory experiences. The company's commitment to innovation and its ability to adapt to market trends have positioned it as a notable player in the perfume industry. With a diverse range of scents, Alcone caters to a varied clientele, from aficionados to those seeking everyday fragrances.

name: Aldi
description: Aldi is a global discount supermarket chain, which operates over 10,000 stores in 20 countries. While primarily known for its grocery offerings, Aldi also sells a range of household products, including personal care items and perfumes. They focus on providing high-quality products at low prices by adopting a streamlined retail model. Aldi's approach often includes creating their own brands, which allows them to control quality and pricing effectively. Their perfumes are marketed under various private labels, offering consumers affordable alternatives to designer fragrances.

name: Aldo
description: Aldo is primarily known as a shoe retailer, but it has diversified its product offerings to include a range of accessories, including fragrances. The company was founded in 1972 and has established a global presence. Aldo emphasizes fashion-forward designs and quality materials, often collaborating with various brands to produce limited edition fragrances that reflect contemporary trends. The fragrance line typically embodies the brand's chic and youthful aesthetic, targeting modern consumers.

name: Alejandro Sanz
description: Alejandro Sanz is a Spanish singer-songwriter who has expanded his brand to include a line of signature fragrances. His perfumes embody the passion and essence of his music, offering unique scents that reflect his artistic identity. The company focuses on creating high-quality and emotionally resonant fragrances that appeal to fans of his music and fragrance enthusiasts alike.

name: Alendor
description: Alendor is a luxury perfume house known for its unique and high-quality fragrances. The company specializes in crafting artisanal perfumes that blend traditional techniques with modern aesthetics. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, Alendor aims to create scents that evoke emotions and memorable experiences. Their story began in the heart of the fragrance industry, where they sought to push the boundaries of conventional perfumery while honoring classic methods. Alendor emphasizes the use of sustainable ingredients and seeks to provide their customers with a truly immersive olfactory experience.
address: 45 Rue de la Perfumerie, Grasse, France

name: Ales Group
description: Ales Group is a global fragrance company specializing in the formulation, manufacturing, and marketing of perfumes and personal care products. Founded in 2009, the company focuses on creating unique scent profiles for its partners, including luxury and mainstream brands. Ales Group prides itself on bringing innovation and creativity to the perfume industry, offering bespoke services that cater to specific brand narratives and customer preferences.

name: Alesha Dixon
description: Alesha Dixon is a British singer, songwriter, and television personality who ventured into the perfume industry. Her fragrance line reflects her personal style and encompasses a range of scents that appeal to her fan base. The company focuses on creating fragrances that embody elegance, youthfulness, and vibrancy, aiming to inspire confidence and joy among its users. Alesha's passion for beauty and fashion plays a significant role in the development and marketing of her perfumes, ensuring that each product resonates with her artistic vision and brand identity.

name: Alessandro Dell'Acqua
description: Alessandro Dell'Acqua is an Italian fashion designer known for his elegant and contemporary style in both clothing and fragrances. Founded in the 1990s, the brand specializes in creating luxurious perfumes that embody the essence of Italian craftsmanship and sophistication. The company captures the unique aesthetic of Alessandro's fashion designs through its fragrance offerings, appealing to a demographic that values high-quality scent experiences that complement their lifestyle.

name: Alex Curran
description: Alex Curran is a British entrepreneur, model, and television personality who is best known for her collaborations in the perfume industry. The brand reflects her personal style and aesthetic, focusing on creating fragrances that resonate with luxury and sophistication. Launched in 2007, the perfumes encapsulate a blend of elegance and playful femininity in their scent profiles. Each fragrance aims to capture the essence of contemporary womanhood while appealing to a broad audience. The company leverages Curran's celebrity status, translating her public persona into curated fragrance collections.

name: Alex+
description: Alex+ is a boutique fragrance company that specializes in high-quality, artisanal perfumes. Established with a focus on innovation and craftsmanship, the company aims to curate unique scent experiences that resonate with individual preferences and lifestyles. Through a blend of modern techniques and traditional practices, Alex+ elevates the presentation of fragrances, making them not only a personal indulgence but also a statement piece.

name: Alex Simone
description: Alex Simone is a luxury fragrance brand that focuses on creating artisanal, high-quality perfumes. Founded by a passionate perfumer with a desire to blend sophistication and unique scent profiles, Alex Simone offers a range of fragrances that appeal to discerning consumers. The brand's specialty lies in its commitment to using premium ingredients combined with careful craftsmanship, resulting in captivating scents that aim to evoke emotions and memories.

name: Alexa Lixfield
description: Alexa Lixfield is a niche perfume house that specializes in creating unique and artistic fragrances inspired by nature, emotions, and personal narratives. Founded by Alexa Lixfield, the company is renowned for its emphasis on storytelling through scent and often collaborates with artists and creatives to develop exclusive perfumes. The brand takes pride in using high-quality ingredients and traditional perfumery techniques, aiming to evoke strong memories and feelings in those who wear their fragrances.

name: Alexander de Rome
description: Alexander de Rome is a niche perfume house known for its handcrafted, artisanal fragrances. The brand draws inspiration from the rich history and culture of perfume-making, particularly influenced by the artistry of the classical Roman era. With a focus on high-quality ingredients and unique scent compositions, Alexander de Rome creates perfumes that tell stories and evoke emotions, appealing to connoisseurs and perfume enthusiasts alike.

name: Alexander Julian
description: Alexander Julian is a fashion brand known for its colorful and artistic approach to design, which extends into the fragrance industry. The brand was founded by designer Alexander Julian in the 1980s and gained recognition for its innovative, bold patterns and vibrant color palettes. The fragrances developed under the Alexander Julian label reflect the same creative spirit, offering unique scents that appeal to those with a strong sense of style and individualism.

name: Alexander McQueen
description: Alexander McQueen is a high fashion brand founded by the British designer Alexander McQueen, known for its avant-garde styles and theatrical presentations. The company emphasizes artistry and craftsmanship in fashion, with a strong focus on tailoring and dramatic designs. Alexander McQueen has expanded its offerings to include a line of fragrances that reflect the same bold, innovative spirit as the fashion collections, often featuring unique and captivating scent combinations. The brand's story is rooted in rebellion, creativity, and a desire to push the boundaries of traditional fashion, making it a significant name in both the fashion and perfume industries.

name: Alexander Perfume
description: Alexander Perfume is a niche perfume company known for its unique and artisanal fragrances. The brand emphasizes high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship, often taking inspiration from art, nature, and historical narratives to create its scent profiles. Their offerings cater to perfume enthusiasts who appreciate distinct olfactory experiences and exclusivity in their fragrance choices. The company aims to evoke emotions and memories through scent, highlighting the profound connection between fragrance and personal identity.

name: Alexanderine
description: Alexanderine is a luxury perfume house that specializes in crafting unique, artisanal fragrances inspired by various cultures and histories. Founded by a passionate perfumer, the brand aims to create a deep sensory experience that transcends traditional perfume boundaries. Each fragrance is designed to tell a story, making the wearer's experience personal and profound. Their specialty lies in blending high-quality ingredients with traditional techniques, resulting in exceptional scent profiles that are both captivating and memorable.

name: Alexandra de Markoff
description: Alexandra de Markoff is a perfume and cosmetics company known for its high-quality, luxurious fragrances. The brand was founded by Alexandra de Markoff, an influential figure in the world of beauty, who aimed to create scents that embody sophistication and elegance. Alexandra de Markoff became well-known in the mid-20th century, especially in the United States, for its distinctive perfumes that catered to an upscale clientele. The company specializes in crafting unique fragrances that emphasize individuality and feminine charm, appealing to those who appreciate artistry in scent.

name: Alexandre Barthet
description: Alexandre Barthet is a niche perfume house known for its unique and artfully crafted fragrances. Founded by perfumer Alexandre Barthet, the brand emphasizes high-quality ingredients and artistic expression, creating scents that evoke emotions and memories. Each fragrance is designed to tell a story, combining traditional perfumery techniques with modern inspirations, making their offerings distinctive in the competitive landscape of the perfume industry.

name: Alexandre.J
description: Alexandre.J is a luxury perfume house founded by Alexandre J. in Paris, France. Known for their unique and artistic fragrance compositions, the brand emphasizes creativity and the art of perfumery. Their scents often draw inspiration from art, culture, and personal experiences, resulting in distinctive fragrances that stand out in the niche perfume market. Alexandre.J is recognized for its elegant packaging and the storytelling aspect behind each scent, making it a favored choice among perfume connoisseurs.

name: Alexandria Fragrances

Alexandria Fragrances specializes in crafting scents inspired by popular niche fragrances, offering alternatives that maintain a similar olfactory profile while being more budget-friendly. This unique approach has garnered a loyal customer base and a strong presence in the fragrance community.

name: Alexis Vogel

With a focus on quality ingredients and bold fragrances, Alexis Vogel aims to empower individuals through beauty and offers a unique fusion of seasoned expertise in makeup artistry and fragrance design.

name: Alexx and Anton
description: Alexx and Anton is a fragrance brand that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes. The brand emphasizes the use of natural ingredients, offering a range of fragrances that cater to diverse tastes while promoting sustainability.

name: Alfred D. McKelvy

name: Alice & Peter

name: All Blacks
description: All Blacks is a brand inspired by the legendary New Zealand rugby team, known for its iconic black jerseys and winning legacy. Their perfumes are crafted to reflect both the ruggedness of the sport and the elegance of their heritage, appealing to both athletic enthusiasts and fragrance lovers alike.

name: All Good Scents
description: All Good Scents is a fragrance brand based in India that focuses on creating unique and high-quality perfumes. Founded by former L'Oreal executive Ankur Bhatia in 2013, the company aims to provide affordable luxury scents that appeal to the modern consumer. They specialize in crafting a diverse range of fragrances using fine ingredients, and they prioritize sustainability and innovation in their product offerings. All Good Scents also emphasizes the importance of customer experience and offers personalized scent recommendations through their online platform.

name: All of Me
description: All of Me is a contemporary perfume company that creates fragrances designed to celebrate individuality and self-expression. The brand emphasizes the importance of personal connection to scent, aiming to craft aromas that resonate with the wearer’s personality and experiences. Their story is rooted in a passion for artistry and craftsmanship, combining high-quality ingredients with unique scent compositions to evoke emotions and memories. All of Me specializes in creating signature scents that offer both sophistication and affordable luxury.

name: Allan Cosmetic Co
description: Allan Cosmetic Co is a prominent player in the fragrance industry, known for its innovative approach to perfume creation. The company's story began with a passion for blending art and science, leading to the establishment of a strong brand identity.

name: Allan-Pfeiffer

address: 1234 Fragrance Lane, Los Angeles, CA 90001, USA

description: Allan's Fine Perfumes is a boutique perfume house known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Their offerings often include limited edition perfumes that appeal to fragrance connoisseurs who appreciate originality and craftsmanship. description: AllBeauty is an online retailer specializing in beauty and fragrance products, offering a comprehensive selection of perfumes, skincare, haircare, and makeup. name: Allen-Browne

Their story is rooted in a passion for sensory experiences, blending high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world, and working with renowned perfumers to craft exclusive fragrances that appeal to discerning customers.

name: Allen Perfumer
description: Allen Perfumer is a renowned fragrance house that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes. With a strong commitment to sustainability and the use of natural ingredients, Allen Perfumer aims to offer a luxurious olfactory experience while honoring the environment. name: Alliance Boots
description: Alliance Boots is a leading international pharmacy-led health and beauty group based in the UK. It was formed through the merger of Boots and Alliance Unichem. The company operates over 4,000 retail pharmacies and stores, and is recognized for its strong portfolio of beauty and wellness products, including fragrances. Alliance Boots specializes in creating and distributing health and beauty products and has a significant presence in the cosmetics and personal care categories. They partner with various brands to enhance their offerings within the perfume industry as part of a broader retail strategy.

name: Alliance UniChem
description: Alliance UniChem is a pharmaceutical and healthcare distribution company that also has a fragrance division. The company specializes in the distribution and supply chain management of pharmaceutical and healthcare products, along with beauty and personal care items, which may include perfumes and fragrances. Their story began in the early 20th century as a small trade business and evolved over decades into a significant player in the healthcare and beauty supply sectors. They focus on developing strategic partnerships with various brands to enhance their product offerings, thereby expanding their presence in the marketplace.

name: Allied Toiletries
description: Allied Toiletries is a well-established player in the fragrance industry, known for creating a wide range of personal care and fragrance products. The company emphasizes innovation and quality, designing fragrances that appeal to diverse consumer preferences across various markets. With a commitment to sustainability and ethical sourcing, Allied Toiletries blends modern trends with classic perfumery techniques to produce unique scents. Their portfolio includes both mass-market products and specialized lines, catering to a broad audience from everyday users to more discerning perfume connoisseurs.

name: AllSaints
description: AllSaints is a British fashion retailer renowned for its edgy and contemporary style, offering a range of high-quality clothing, accessories, and fragrances. Founded in 1994, the brand’s aesthetic draws heavily from urban influences, merging British roots with international fashion trends. AllSaints specializes in creating unique, lifestyle-focused products, including its line of perfumes that embody its signature sophistication and boldness, often characterized by a blend of unconventional and distinct scent profiles.

name: Allured Books
description: Allured Books is a specialized publisher focusing on the fragrance and cosmetics industry. Founded by Richard and Lisa Allured, the company began its journey to educate and inform about the art and science of perfume-making through books, magazines, and educational resources. They offer a range of publications that cover various aspects of perfumery, providing insights for both industry professionals and fragrance enthusiasts. Their specialty lies in creating content that not only showcases current trends and techniques but also pays homage to the rich history of perfume artistry.

name: Allured
description: Allured is a prominent entity in the perfume industry, primarily recognized for its comprehensive coverage of the fragrance sector through publications, exhibitions, and online resources. The company is known for producing specialized content that helps both consumers and industry professionals stay informed about the latest trends, innovations, and brand developments in the fragrance market. Allured's publications include industry-leading titles such as "Perfumer & Flavorist" and "Beauty Packaging". Founded with the mission to educate and connect people with a passion for perfumes, Allured has cultivated a reputation for being a critical resource in both the perfume and cosmetics industries.

name: Almah
description: Almah is a boutique perfume company that specializes in creating unique and high-quality fragrances. It emphasizes the artistry of perfumery, showcasing a blend of traditional techniques and contemporary influences. The company is dedicated to crafting scents that embody elegance and sophistication, appealing to a niche market seeking distinctive olfactory experiences.

name: Almay
description: Almay is a cosmetic brand originally launched in 1931, focusing on hypoallergenic products designed for sensitive skin. While it is primarily known for its makeup line, Almay has expanded into the fragrance market with offerings that cater to individuals looking for gentle and allergy-conscious options. The brand emphasizes simplicity and purity, making it a go-to choice for consumers seeking effective yet non-irritating products.

name: Aloette
description: Aloette is a skincare and fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality, natural beauty products. Founded in 1978, the brand originally focused on skincare, but has since expanded its offerings to include a variety of fragrances. Aloette aims to provide products that enhance beauty through the use of natural ingredients and innovative formulations, often appealing to the eco-conscious consumer. The company emphasizes the importance of holistic beauty and offers a range of products that cater to various personal care needs.

name: Aloha Beauty
description: Aloha Beauty is a perfume company known for its commitment to creating high-quality, unique fragrances that embody the essence of the Hawaiian spirit and natural beauty. Founded with a vision to bring the tropical paradise of Hawaii to the world, Aloha Beauty sources local ingredients and focuses on sustainable practices. Their specialty lies in crafting scents that evoke warm memories of the islands, utilizing natural essences such as coconut, hibiscus, and plumeria, resulting in both personal fragrances and home scents that celebrate tropical living.

name: Alpa
description: Alpa is a well-known fragrance company based in India, specializing in creating a range of affordable perfumes and colognes. Established in the mid-20th century, Alpa has built a reputation for offering quality fragrances that cater to a broad audience, highlighting a mix of traditional and modern scent profiles. The company emphasizes value for money and aims to provide accessible luxury through their diverse selection of products, making them a popular choice in the Indian market as well as among consumers looking for budget-friendly options.

name: Alpha Emu
description: Alpha Emu is a perfume company renowned for its innovative approach to fragrance creation, emphasizing unique blends and sustainable practices. The company is particularly noted for its use of natural ingredients and commitment to eco-friendly packaging, appealing to a growing niche market of environmentally-conscious consumers.

name: Alpha Hydrox
description: Alpha Hydrox is primarily known for its skincare products rather than perfumes. Established in the late 1990s, the company specializes in chemical exfoliation using alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) to promote healthier skin. Their product line includes glycolic acid-based cleansers, moisturizers, and treatments, aimed at improving skin texture and appearance. While they do not primarily focus on fragrances, their skincare line reflects a commitment to quality and innovation in personal care.

name: Alpha Musk
description: Alpha Musk is a fragrance company specializing in crafting high-quality musk-based perfumes. description: A'Lure Toilet Co is a fragrance company known for its focus on unique and artistic scent compositions. Established with a vision to celebrate the art of perfumery, A'Lure Toilet Co specializes in creating high-quality, niche fragrances that appeal to connoisseurs of fine perfumes. The brand emphasizes craftsmanship and creativity, often featuring limited edition releases that reflect the founder's passion for olfactory exploration.
address: 123 Scents Avenue, Perfume City, CA 90210, United States

name: Alurent
description: Alurent is a niche perfume company that specializes in crafting unique, high-quality fragrances inspired by nature and the art of perfumery. Founded with the ambition to create scents that evoke emotion and connection, Alurent combines traditional techniques with modern innovation. The company focuses on small-batch productions to ensure attention to detail and quality, offering customers personalized experiences through their signature scents.

name: Aluwwah
description: Aluwwah is a niche perfume company specializing in creating unique, high-quality fragrances inspired by exotic locations and rich cultural heritage. With a strong emphasis on artisanal craftsmanship, Aluwwah seeks to blend traditional perfumery techniques with modern sensibilities to offer a luxurious olfactory experience. The brand’s story revolves around the passion for scent-making and the desire to evoke emotions and memories through carefully curated perfume blends.

name: Alvarez Gomez
description: Alvarez Gomez is a distinguished Spanish perfume company, established in 1899 by the Alvarez Gomez family in Madrid. The brand is renowned for its high-quality colognes, body lotions, and scented products that reflect Spanish heritage. Its signature fragrance, "Agua de Colonia," is well-loved and represents a blend of traditional and contemporary perfumery, focusing on natural ingredients and artisanal craftsmanship. Alvarez Gomez has carved a niche in the market for its commitment to quality and authenticity, focusing on creating fragrances that embody the essence of Spain.

name: Alviero Martini
description: Alviero Martini is an Italian fashion brand known for its luxury leather goods, accessories, and fragrances. Founded by designer Alviero Martini in the late 1980s, the brand gained fame for its signature "Geo" print, which features a distinctive world map design. Alviero Martini's fragrance line embodies the same spirit of adventure and sophistication, offering scents that reflect global influences and the brand's commitment to elegance. The company emphasizes high-quality craftsmanship and has positioned itself in the luxury market, appealing to a clientele that values both exclusivity and style.

name: Alyaka
description: Alyaka is a fragrance and beauty e-commerce platform specializing in niche and artisanal perfumes. Founded with a passion for unique scent experiences, Alyaka offers a curated selection of perfumes from around the world, focusing on quality ingredients and unique compositions. The company connects customers with both established and emerging fragrance houses, providing a platform for discovering rare and exclusive fragrances that are not commonly found in mainstream retail.

name: Alys
description: Alys is a niche perfume brand specializing in artisanal fragrances crafted from high-quality ingredients. The company emphasizes the story behind each scent, often inspired by nature, culture, and personal experiences. With a commitment to sustainability and ethical practices, Alys has cultivated a unique identity in the perfume industry, appealing to fragrance connoisseurs and those seeking distinct olfactory experiences.

name: Alyson Oldoini
description: Alyson Oldoini is a niche perfume house renowned for its artistic and olfactory storytelling through fragrance. Founded by Italian-born perfumer Alyson Oldoini, the brand blends essential oils and natural ingredients to craft unique scents that evoke emotions and experiences rather than conforming to mainstream fragrance trends. The company emphasizes on quality, originality, and personal expression, making each perfume a reflection of artistry and individuality.

name: Alyssa Ashley
description: Alyssa Ashley is a perfume company known for its innovative and unique fragrances, often inspired by the spirit of youth and individuality. The brand was originally launched in 1990, gaining recognition for its signature scents that blend modern and classic olfactory notes. It has developed a strong following among consumers for its approachable pricing, allowing quality perfumes to be accessible to a wider audience. Over the years, Alyssa Ashley has expanded its product line to include body cares and gift sets while maintaining a commitment to creativity and fragrance artistry.

name: AM Associates
description: AM Associates is a perfume company that specializes in the crafting of bespoke fragrances. Established by a group of fragrance enthusiasts and experts, the company aims to provide customers with unique scent experiences that resonate with their personal stories and preferences. Their offerings include both pre-made collections and customized scents tailored to individual tastes, emphasizing the art and science of perfumery.

name: Amado
description: Amado is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating unique and artistic fragrances. Their specialty lies in their commitment to high-quality ingredients and innovative scent compositions, aiming to evoke emotions and memories through their carefully crafted perfumes.

name: Amaffi
description: Amaffi is a unique perfume house that specializes in luxury fragrances inspired by the art of perfumery. name: Aman
description: Aman is a luxury perfume brand that specializes in artisanal fragrances inspired by various global cultures and traditions. Aman was founded on the principles of creating a sensory experience that connects individuals to their inner selves and the environment.

name: Amanda Lepore
description: Amanda Lepore is a well-known figure in the fashion and beauty industry, celebrated for her contributions to the world of art, music, and performance. Her perfume line encapsulates her unique aesthetic and persona, representing glamour and individuality. The fragrances often reflect her bold style and are targeted towards fans of niche luxury scents. The brand emphasizes creativity and self-expression, aligning with Amanda's identity as an icon in the LGBTQ+ community.

name: Amaran
description: Amaran is a luxury perfume house that specializes in creating high-quality, handcrafted fragrances. The company is known for its commitment to using artisanal techniques and premium ingredients to develop unique scent profiles that appeal to a discerning clientele. Amaran's story begins with a passion for perfumery and a desire to redefine luxury through the art of scent, offering an exclusive range of perfumes infused with rich cultural inspirations and storytelling.

name: Amaranthus Herbis
description: Amaranthus Herbis is a niche perfume house that specializes in creating artisanal fragrances inspired by nature and botanical elements. Founded by a team of perfumers and botanists, the company emphasizes sustainability and the use of natural ingredients in their compositions. Their story began with a deep appreciation for the diverse flora around the world and a desire to capture the essence of plants in beautiful, wearable forms. Amaranthus Herbis crafts unique scents that reflect the harmony between nature and art, aiming to offer a sensory experience that transports wearers to lush landscapes and serene environments.

name: Amayori
description: Amayori is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating artisanal fragrances inspired by the ancient traditions of Japan. The brand combines traditional Japanese artistry with modern perfume-making techniques to craft unique scents that tell a story and evoke memories. Their products often feature rare and luxurious ingredients sourced from Japan and are created with an emphasis on craftsmanship and quality. The story of Amayori is deeply rooted in the concept of "monozukuri," or the spirit of craftsmanship, aiming to blend the beauty of nature with olfactory art.

name: Amberfig

name: Ambientair
description: Ambientair is a company that specializes in creating home fragrances and air care products. Founded in 2005 in Spain, the company has made a name for itself in the ambient scents market, offering a diverse range of products, including scented candles, reed diffusers, and room sprays. Ambientair focuses on providing high-quality, innovative products designed to enhance the atmosphere in residential and commercial spaces. Their philosophy emphasizes environmental sustainability and the use of natural ingredients, offering consumers a premium olfactory experience.

name: Ambra di Venezia
description: Ambra di Venezia is a luxury perfume company that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances inspired by the rich cultural history and natural beauty of Venice, Italy. The brand emphasizes the use of traditional Italian craftsmanship and the finest raw materials to produce unique scent profiles that evoke the essence of the city and its heritage. Ambra di Venezia aims to deliver an olfactory experience that reflects the elegance and sophistication of Venetian art and architecture.

name: Ambre Blends
